Name: fatal familial insomnia
Definition: A prion disease that is characterized by insomnia

Name: Huntington's disease-like 1
Definition: A prion disease that is characterized by a phenocopy of Huntington disease (unwanted choreatic movements

Name: Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease
Definition: A Trichomonas vaginalis trichomoniasis that involves inflammation of the urinary bladder caused by Trichomonas vaginalis. The symptoms include pain during urination

Name: chronic wasting disease
Definition: A cerebrovascular disease that is characterized by an area of necrotic tissue in the brain resulting from a blockage or narrowing in the arteries supplying blood and oxygen to the brain.

Name: obsolete peste des petits ruminants infectious disease
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in infection in ruminants

Name: obsolete Morbillivirus infectious disease
Definition: A Paramyxoviridae infectious disease that results_in infection in dogs

Name: Gerstmann-Straussler-Scheinker syndrome
Definition: A prion disease characterized by adult onset of memory loss

Name: obsolete certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
Definition: A prion disease characterized by adult onset of memory loss

Name: scrapie
Definition: An ovarian disease where ovaries do not produce estrogen despite high levels of circulating gonadotropins in women under 40.

Name: variant Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease
Definition: An ovarian disease where ovaries do not produce estrogen despite high levels of circulating gonadotropins in women under 40.

Name: kuru
Definition: A Polyomaviridae infectious disease that results_in infection in animals and humans
